comments.body:
In the tests it works fine. I just wanted to expose as less as possible.
Shall I replace "private[mllib]" with "@DeveloperApi"?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -29,7 +30,7 @@ import org.apache.spark.util.Utils
  * Machine learning specific RDD functions.

 private[mllib]

comments.body: I think it is necessary to replace `private[mllib]` with `@DeveloperApi`. Otherwise, the methods under `RDDFunctions` won't show up in the generated doc.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -29,7 +30,7 @@ import org.apache.spark.util.Utils
